text: The 1934 Washington University Bears football team was an American football team that represented Washington University of St. Louis as a member of the Missouri Valley Conference (MVC) during the 1934 college football season. In its third season under head coach Jimmy Conzelman, the team compiled a 7–3 record, won the MVC championship, and outscored opponents by a total of 212 to 59. The team played its home games at Francis Field in St. Louis. ==Schedule== ==References== Washington University Category:Washington University Bears football seasons Category:Missouri Valley Conference football champion seasons Washington University Bears football
title: 1934 Washington University Bears football team
